name: Pongy
description:
Submission for https://itch.io/jam/gdl-may-jam

Theme: Remake a classic with a twist

Engine: Phaser 3 / HTML5

Development Time: ~14 hours

This is my first game in Phaser 3 (other than the getting started tutorial). It was actually pretty fun, but challenging too. Hopefully I can make more interesting games in the future!
